column1: angular to terete, often somewhat verruculose, often waxy, often pubescent in furrows
articles not or scarcely greater in diam. at apex when dried,
articles quadrangular, smooth on faces, verruculose on angles with furrows often becoming open and obvious
articles terete, mostly glabrous in furrows
elongate article(s) 1 or 2, terete to subquadrangular
